name: FastRun
description:
FastRun est un prototype de jeu. L'idée de base est d'atteindre la fin du niveau le plus rapidement possible.

Le développement du jeu est suspendu pour le moment.

FastRun is a prototype game. The pitch is go to the end faster you can.

Developement is paused for now.

Player Character & animations: Mixamo

Level Assets: Infinity Blade: Grass Land by Epic Games

Source Code: https://github.com/Jbristhuille/-UE4-FastRun
